title: Plot line: If Gender was a religion
text:
Genre: Funny, drama
If all women decide to stop humanity, they can just stop giving birth
Movie starts with India’s dignitaries inviting all other nations women to come to India.
Then, through a journalist, reveal the 20 years of infant population decline and blah blah.
Why? - Big scope for drama but shouldn’t be obvious like any other films
Interval Bang - Men’s religion is so upset now that they said they won’t give sperm
What extremes does a government to increase population can be the rest of the movie
